titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to support Ukraine's accession into the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO).
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to support Ukraine's accession into the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO).

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for Ukraine's accession into the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO). It also urges the President to engage with NATO leaders to develop a clear pathway for Ukraine's accession to NATO, viewing such accession as critical to preventing future wars and promoting peace.
